item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-27
item.description: Exclusive: This is our first look at Android 13 “Tiramisu” and some of its upcoming features (5 minute read) A source with access to a very early Android 13 build has shared screenshots showing several upcoming features and changes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-14
item.description: The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience' Hits PS5 and Xbox Series X/S (1 minute read) Epic Games has released The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience, a tech demo with ultra-realistic visuals and open-world environments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-26
item.description: Adorable redesigned emoji—including Clippy—included in latest Windows 11 update (2 minute read) Microsoft will add redesigned emoji in the next Windows 11 update.
